title: Tanis, the Shadow Years
description: The sixth and final title in a series of recovers of the classic Preludes series.First launched over a decade ago, the Preludes series has continued to prove popular with Dragonlance fans. This re-release of Tanis, The Shadow Years showcases a new look that is also reflected in the other recovers of this series. The title features cover art from lead Dragonlance saga artist Matt Stawicki.
author: Barbara Siegel
